fig, ax = plt.subplots(11, 1, figsize=(25, 100));
plt.rc('font', size=15)
plt.rc('xtick', labelsize=15)    
plt.rc('ytick', labelsize=15)

for vehicle_type, axe in zip(list_of_vehicles, ax):
    vehicle_value_data = vehicle_data.groupby('Location')[vehicle_type].sum().sort_values(ascending=False)[:10]
    location = [locations.split(" ")[0] for locations in vehicle_value_data.index]
    sns.barplot(x=location, y=vehicle_value_data.values, ax=axe)
    axe.set_title(f'Top 10 Locations with high acciedent rate with the following vehicle - {vehicle_type}')
    axe.set_xlabel("Locations")
    axe.set_ylabel("Number of accidents")

fig, ax = plt.subplots(4, 1, figsize=(25, 100))
plt.rc('font', size=15)
plt.rc('xtick', labelsize=15)    
plt.rc('ytick', labelsize=15)

for injury_col, axe in zip(injuries_data, ax.ravel()):
    injure_data = sev_of_dam_data.groupby('Districts')[injury_col].sum().sort_values(ascending=False)[:10]
    districts = [district.split(" ")[0] for district in injure_data.index]
    sns.barplot(x=districts, y=injure_data, ax=axe)
    axe.set_title(f'Top 10 Districts with high accident rate with {injury_col}')
    axe.set_xlabel("Districts")
    axe.set_ylabel("Number of accidents")
